publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3603# Dr Elaine Murray: One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programmeâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the support given to lone parents and other excluded groups by One Plus and its partner organisations, including offering access to vocational training and employment, and believes that the "Grow Your Own" training programme for community workers in north west Dumfries, organised by the Maxwelltown Umbrella Group and One Plus, is an excellent example of partnership working.

S2M-3603# One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programme (lodged on 18 November 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Sarah Boyack*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Jamieson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Murray Tosh*, Scott Barrie*, Des McNulty*, Frances Curran*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3603# One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programme (lodged on 18 November 2005) Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3603# One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programme (lodged on 18 November 2005) Trish Godman*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3603# One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programme (lodged on 18 November 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3603# One Plus Grow Your Own Training Programme (lodged on 18 November 2005) John Home Robertson*, Elaine Smith*
